data.name: Kestrel
data.description: A founding member of S.T.R.I.K.E., Kestrel uses her portal gun to prevent enemies from summoning and blast the weakest target among them.

starItems.name: Kestrel
starItems.description: A founding member of S.T.R.I.K.E., Kestrel uses her portal gun to prevent enemies from summoning and blast the weakest target among them.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>. Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>70%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>. Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>70%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>70%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>. Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>70%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
Always apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to primary and secondary targets

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>. Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>310%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>. Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to primary and secondary targets

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>370%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>310%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.

1.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to each target.
Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self.

This attack is unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to each target.
Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self.

This attack is unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to each target.
Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self.

This attack is unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self

4.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to each target.
Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self.

This attack is unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

5.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to each target.
Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self.

This attack is unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

6.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to each target.
Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self.

This attack is unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to each target
Apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self

7.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to each target.
Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns + <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self.

This attack is unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

1.description:
Clear <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from primary target.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to the primary target + attack for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.

2.description:
Clear <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from primary target.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to the primary target + attack for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.

3.description:
Clear <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from primary target.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to the primary target + attack for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.

4.description:
Clear <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from primary target.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to the primary target + attack for <color=#86e619>300%</color> Piercing.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.

5.description:
Clear <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from primary target.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to the primary target + attack for <color=#86e619>400%</color> Piercing.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing to Primary Target
Clear all positive effects from primary target

6.description:
Clear all positive effects from primary target.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to the primary target  + attack for <color=#86e619>500%</color> Piercing.

 Gain +<color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing to Primary Target
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

7.description:
Clear all positive effects from primary target.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to the primary target for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns + attack for <color=#86e619>600%</color> Piercing.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.

1.description:
On Spawn gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color> + <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

On Turn, heal self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health.
On Turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color> and any enemy has attempted to Summon or Clone this match, clear <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

While this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, enemies cannot Summon or Clone.
1.nextUpgrade:
On Turn, clear all negative effects from Self
During ally turn, if an enemy with <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> is attacked, attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage

2.description:
On Spawn gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color> + <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

On Turn, heal self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health + clear all negative effects from Self.
On Turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color> and any enemy has attempted to Summon or Clone this match, clear <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

During ally turn, if an enemy with <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> is attacked, attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.

While this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, enemies cannot Summon or Clone.
2.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health
If at least one ally is <color=#fff568>COSMIC</color> or Nick Fury, gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> additional Max Health
Nick Fury allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health

3.description:
On Spawn gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color> + <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

On Turn, heal self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health + clear all negative effects from Self.
On Turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color> and any enemy has attempted to Summon or Clone this match, clear <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

During ally turn, if an enemy with <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> is attacked, attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health. If at least one ally is <color=#fff568>COSMIC</color> or Nick Fury, gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> additional Max Health. Nick Fury allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health.

While this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, enemies cannot Summon or Clone.
3.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to the most injured enemy
<color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Focus
<color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Resistance

4.description:
On Spawn gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color> + <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

On Turn, heal self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health + clear all negative effects from Self.
On Turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color> and any enemy has attempted to Summon or Clone this match, clear <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

During ally turn, if an enemy with <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> is attacked, attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health. If at least one ally is <color=#fff568>COSMIC</color> or Nick Fury, gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> additional Max Health. Nick Fury allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health.

<color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Focus. 
<color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Resistance.

While this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, enemies cannot Summon or Clone.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Healing
If negative effects removed, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> per negative effect removed
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to the most injured enemy
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health for Nick Fury ally

5.description:
On Spawn gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color> + <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

On Turn, heal self for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of Max Health + clear all negative effects from Self. If negative effects removed, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> per negative effect removed.
On Turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color> and any enemy has attempted to Summon or Clone this match, clear <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

During ally turn, if an enemy with <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> is attacked, attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health. If at least one ally is <color=#fff568>COSMIC</color> or Nick Fury, gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> additional Max Health. Nick Fury allies gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Max Health.

<color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Focus. 
<color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Resistance.

While this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, enemies cannot Summon or Clone.
